headline: UBS Raises its Price Target on Ross Stores, Inc. (ROST) to $199 and Maintains a Neutral Rating
summary: Ross Stores, Inc. (NASDAQ:ROST) is among the 11 Best All-Time High Stocks to Buy According to Wall Street. On February 17, 2026, UBS raised its price target on Ross Stores, Inc. (NASDAQ:ROST) to $199 from $181 previously and maintained a Neutral rating, citing a balanced upside and downside skew heading into the fourth quarter earnings […]
